fieldUpdates.description: Stamps the parent parent name on to the department health authority field.
fieldUpdates.formula: IF( RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Division', Parent.Parent.Name, IF( RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Hospital', Parent.Name, IF(RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Regional_Health_Authority', Name, '') ) )
fieldUpdates.name: Stamp Health Authority

rules.description: (DEPRECATED - DO NOT USE) To facilitate sharing from department to health authority level, stamp the Health Authority name on the department records. This functionality has been replaced by a trigger.
